entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:06 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries near the Cariboo mountains in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Amount 4 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:06 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
